name: RDP Login from Localhost
description: RDP login with localhost source address may be a tunnelled login
query: (winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:4624 AND winlog.event_data.LogonType:10 AND source.ip:(\:\:1 OR 127.0.0.1))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:4624 AND winlog.event_data.LogonType:10 AND source.ip:(\:\:1 OR 127.0.0.1))`
